name: Pilots of the Dawn
description:
Become an ace of the skies! Battle through 30 challenging missions, fight bosses and upgrade your aircraft.

Pilots of the Dawn is inspired by other classics of the same genre, but it brings a brand new experience to shoot 'em up fans.

Game features:
- Spectacular fights on air and sea
- Three game modes: Endless, Daily and Campaign
- Five unique fighter aircrafts for you to upgrade
- 30 missions to challenge your pilot skills
- A brand new random mission every day
- Beat high scores on global leaderboard
- Record your aerial battles and share them through Everyplay
